Class StudentGradeStatisticsController

java.lang.Object
comp3111.examsystem.controller.StudentGradeStatisticsController
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class StudentGradeStatisticsController extends Object implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
The `StudentGradeStatisticsController` class manages the grade statistics view for students. It displays the grades in a table and a bar chart, and allows filtering by course.
